title: Non-Conforming Uses Existing Lawfully - Any lawful non-conforming use of premises existing prior to the date of coming in to force of the Development Plan / Regional Plan / Planning Proposal shall continue and may be allowed to be expanded within the holding in the original sanctioned permission and that when a building containing non-conforming use is pulled down or has fallen down, the use of the new building shall be in conformity with these regulations or with lawful existing use
clause_text: Non-Conforming Uses Existing Lawfully - Any lawful non-conforming use of premises existing prior to the date of coming in to force of the Development Plan / Regional Plan / Planning Proposal shall continue and may be allowed to be expanded within the holding in the original sanctioned permission and that when a building containing non-conforming use is pulled down or has fallen down, the use of the new building shall be in conformity with these regulations or with lawful existing use.
section: 3.13 DEVELOPMENT OF CYCLE TRACK ALONG RIVER AND NALLAH

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
